ai.summary: Explore Charlton Trail is an 8.3 km moderate hike in the UK, offering a steady pace with scenic views and well-marked paths. Suitable for hikers with a reasonable level of fitness and comfortable footwear.
ai.terrain_summary: Mixed terrain including well-marked trails, gentle ascents, grassy paths, and occasional uneven rocky sections. Expect muddy sections after rain and potential wind exposure in open areas.
ai.safety_notes: Check the weather forecast before you go and dress in layers. Wear sturdy hiking boots and bring a waterproof layer. Stay on marked trails, watch your footing on uneven ground, and beware of muddy sections. Carry a map or GPS, a fully charged phone, enough water, snacks, and a basic first aid kit. Let someone know your planned route and ETA. In low light, carry a headlamp or flashlight and a whistle for emergencies.
recommended_gear: Map or GPS device (and compass as backup)
Light rain jacket and an extra layer
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October); bring layers and be prepared for changeable UK weather year-round.

seo.title: Explore Charlton Trail – 8.3 km Moderate Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover the 8.3 km Explore Charlton Trail in the United Kingdom. A moderate hike with mixed terrain, ideal for a scenic day trip.
